name: International Aero Training Academy
about: International Aero Training Academy (IATAC) is a premier flight training institution located in Sandakan, Sabah, Malaysia. As the only flight academy in Sabah, IATAC is a Malaysian DCA Approved Flying Training Organization, preparing students for the Airline Transport Pilot License along with the Ground Subjects syllabus of the European Aviation Safety Authority. Equipped with state-of-the-art facilities, including the latest commercial-style glass cockpits, Diamond DA40 XLS single engine and DA42 twin engine aircraft, and the Alsim DA42-200 Flight Simulator, IATAC ensures exceptional flight training. With a strong focus on safety, competency, and compliance, IATAC provides innovative learning tools and world-class facilities to equip aspiring pilots for successful careers in aviation. IATAC is committed to excellence in pilot training, making it a leading choice for those aspiring to become professional pilots.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
EASA ATPL Ground School"]
